summary: THE VEHICLE CAME EQUIPPED  WITH A "15" SPARE TIRE.  IF THE TIRE WAS USED WITH THE 4 WHEEL DRIVE ENGAGED, IT WOULD PUT A BIND ON THE AXLE AND CAUSE IT TO BREAK.  *JB  16 INCH TIRES WON'T FIT UNDER THE VEHICLE.  THE MANUFACTURER WAS CONTACTED.  THE CONSUMER FELT THAT THE DEALER SHOULD REPLACE THE TIRES WITH 15 INCH TIRE AND WHEEL WITH 16 INCH TIRE AND WHEEL.  SCC
